verbs.description: [ARG0: The National Rifle Association] [V: modified] [ARG1: an infamous CNN advertisement] [ARGM-PRP: to mock the mainstream media outlet , which has routinely been accused of being " fake news " in the Trump - era . To combat the rise of fake news] , CNN released a series of ads featuring fruit . The advertisements also took pot shots at President Donald Trump . The NRA 's ad featured a lemon and alleged CNN " colluded " with Hillary Clinton 's campaign during the 2016 presidential election . Indeed , it was revealed last year that Donna Brazile , then a CNN analyst , gave Clinton 's campaign pre - determined debate questions during the Democratic primary . Seung Min Kim , a Washington Post White House reporter , tweeted the video . " This is a lemon . Its network colluded with a Democratic presidential candidate . It 's colleague gave debate questions to Hillary Clinton . Do n't be fooled . This is not a journalist . This is a lemon , a bitter lemon , " the ad stated . https://twitter.com/seungminkim/status/992456158907596800
